page.title: 08TYPES OF OCCUPATION
page.content:
PERCENTAGE OF ECONOMICALLY ACTIVE HEADS OF HOUSEHOLD BY SOCIO-ECONOMIC GROUP -S.OXON.AVERAGE IN BRACKETS. EMPLOYERS & MANGERS 11.0% (21.7) PROFESSIONAL 6.4% ( 8.8) NON-MANUAL 20.1% (19.8) SKILLED & SEMI-SKILLED 29.2% (19.7) MANUAL & FARM 18.3% (15.9) UNSKILLED MANUAL 6.4% ( 4.0) OWN ACCOUNT 5.0% ( 7.0) ARMED FORCES 1.8% ( 1.7) INADEQUATELY DESCRIBED 1.8% ( 1.4)
TO CHECK THESE FIGURES ,A SMALL SURVEY WAS DONE OF JOBS HELD BY PEOPLE IN DIDCOT AND HARWELL VILLAGE.OF 25 QUESTIONED(16 FEMALE),21 LIVE IN DIDCOT.ONE WAS A SCIENTIST.8 WERE IN SERVICE INDUSTRIES.7 WERE SKILLED.4 WERE MANAGERS.5 WERE MANUAL WORKERS.3 PEOPLE HAD MOVED TO DIDCOT FOR THE JOB.
